725198f-a.text:
(1)
31st Street (right, not seen), west side, north of Twenty-first Ave., showing a rear view of the Peter Rapelje house and smoke house. The City History Club Guide gives full data on this property.
May 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, looking northwestward.
May 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same, shoWing only the smoke house.
May 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(4)
The same, looking northeast.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

725112f-a.text: 21st Avenue, south side, between 31st and 33rd Streets, showing the Grace Evangelical Lutheran church. P.L. Sparr View 1: June 3, 1927 view 2: May 27, 1934

725112f-b.text: 21st Avenue, south side, between 31st and 33rd Streets, showing the Grace Evangelical Lutheran church. P.L. Sparr View 1: June 3, 1927 view 2: May 27, 1934

725197f-a.text:
21-39 31st Street, east side, between 21at Avenue and DDitmars Boulevard, showing an old home. It first appears
in a 1909 atlas.
P. L. Sperr  May 27, 1934

725199f-a.text:
31st Street, adjoining and at the S.E. corner of 21st Avenue, looking north toward the latter.
P. L. Sperr  May 27, 1934

725201f-a.text:
31st Street, west side, north of Twenty-first Ave. (left) about 200 feet, showing a westerly view of the John Alsop farmhouse. See
other views for more data.
May 1923.
View 2: March 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
